mapper.select: select ad.d_no as "d_no", ad.d_title as "d_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS "d_content", ad.d_status as "d_status", ad.e_no as "e_no", ad.d_category as "d_category", to_char(ad.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date", e.e_name as "e_name", e.dept_name "dept_name" from approval_doc ad left join employee e on ad.e_no = e.e_no where e.e_no = #{value} and ad.d_status not in('종결', '반려', '임시저장') order by ad.d_no desc

select distinct ad.d_no as "d_no", ad.d_title as "d_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS "d_content", ad.d_status as "d_status", ad.e_no as "e_no", ad.d_category as "d_category", to_char(ad.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date", e.e_name as "e_name", e.dept_name "dept_name" from approval_doc ad join employee e on ad.e_no = e.e_no join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ah.d_no = ad.D_NO where ah.ap_id = #{value} and ap_result = '대기중' and ad.d_status in('진행중', '상신') order by ad.d_no desc

select distinct ad.d_no as "d_no", ad.d_title as "d_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS "d_content", ad.d_status as "d_status", ad.e_no as "e_no", ad.d_category as "d_category", to_char(ad.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date", e.e_name as "e_name", e.dept_name "dept_name" from approval_doc ad join employee e on ad.e_no = e.e_no join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ah.d_no = ad.D_NO where #{value} in(e.e_no, ah.ap_id) and ad.D_STATUS = '반려' order by ad.d_no desc

select distinct ad.d_no as "d_no", ad.d_title as "d_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS "d_content", ad.d_status as "d_status", ad.e_no as "e_no", ad.d_category as "d_category", to_char(ad.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date", e.e_name as "e_name", e.dept_name "dept_name" from approval_doc ad join employee e on ad.e_no = e.e_no join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ah.d_no = ad.D_NO where #{value} in(e.e_no, ah.ap_id) and ad.D_STATUS = '종결' order by ad.d_no desc

select distinct ad.d_no as "d_no", ad.d_title as "d_title", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS "d_content", ad.d_status as "d_status", ad.e_no as "e_no", ad.d_category as "d_category", to_char(ad.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date", e.e_name as "e_name", e.dept_name "dept_name" from approval_doc ad join employee e on ad.e_no = e.e_no where ad.E_NO = #{value} and ad.D_STATUS = '임시저장' order by ad.d_no desc

select dept.dept_name as "dept_name", e.e_no as "e_no", e.e_name "e_name", e.e_rank "e_rank" from EMPLOYEE e join (select dept_name from EMPLOYEE group by dept_name having dept_name is not null) dept on e.dept_name = dept.dept_name order by e.dept_name

select (select count(distinct ad.d_no) from APPROVAL_DOC ad join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ad.d_no = ah.d_no where ah.ap_id = #{value} and ap_result = '대기중' and ad.d_status in('진행중', '상신')) as "wait_cnt" ,(select count(distinct ad.d_no) from APPROVAL_DOC ad join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ad.d_no = ah.d_no where ah.ap_id = #{value} and ah.ap_result = '승인' and ad.D_STATUS = '진행중') as "progress_cnt" ,(select count(distinct ad.d_no) from APPROVAL_DOC ad join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ad.d_no = ah.d_no where #{value} in(ad.E_NO, ah.AP_ID) and ad.D_STATUS = '반려')as "deny_cnt" from dual
mapper.insert: insert into APPROVAL_DOC(d_no, d_title, d_content, d_status, e_no, d_category, reg_date, mod_date, reg_id, mod_id) values(SEQ_APPROVAL_NO.nextval, #{d_title}, #{d_content},#{d_status} ,#{e_no},#{d_category}, sysdate, sysdate,#{e_no},#{e_no})
mapper.select: select ad.d_no, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(ad.d_content, 4000, 1) AS d_content, ad.d_title, ad.d_status, ad.e_no, e.e_name, e.e_rank, ad.D_CATEGORY, to_char(ad.reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss') as reg_date ,e.dept_name, af.ap_file_no, af.ap_filename, ah.ap_no, ah.ap_lev, ah.ap_result, ah.ap_id,(select e_name from EMPLOYEE where e_no = ah.ap_id) as ap_name ,(select e_rank from EMPLOYEE where e_no = ah.ap_id) as ap_rank, ah.ap_cdate, ah.ap_category, ah.ap_comment from APPROVAL_DOC ad left join APPROVAL_FILE af on ad.d_no = af.d_no left join APPROVAL_HISTORY ah on ad.d_no = ah.d_no join EMPLOYEE e on ad.e_no = e.e_no where ad.d_no = #{value} order by ap_category , ap_lev

mapper.update: update APPROVAL_HISTORY set ap_result=#{ap_result}, ap_cdate=sysdate, ap_comment=#{ap_comment}, reg_date=sysdate, mod_id=#{ap_id} where ap_no = #{ap_no}
